computer_extension_attribute.name: ARD Field 3
computer_extension_attribute.description: This attribute returns the ARD Computer Info field #3 from the Computer Information attributes in the Apple Remote Desktop settings of a machine.

input_type.script: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.apple.RemoteDesktop.plist" ]; then echo "<result>`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.RemoteDesktop Text3`</result>" fi
